sense.def:
A moment
je zelo kratko obdobje.

seg.quote: She hesitated for only a moment.
A few moments later he heard footsteps.
At that precise moment, Miss Pulteney came into the office.

sense.def:
Nekaj, kar obstaja
at the moment
, obstaja zdaj.

seg.quote: The biggest problem at the moment is unemployment.

sense.def:
Kadar človek naredi nekaj
at the last moment
, tisto naredi zadnji čas, ko je še mogoče.

seg.quote: We escaped from Saigon at the last moment.

sense.def:
Kadar nečesa ne moremo narediti
for the moment
, tistega ne moremo narediti zdaj, morda pa bomo lahko pozneje.

seg.quote: I don't want to discuss this for the moment.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
the moment something else happens
, se zgodi takoj, ko se zgodi tisto drugo.

seg.quote: The moment I saw this, it appealed to me.
